A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a movie\, appalling. As a Star Wars movie\, absolutely disasterous. Zero suspense (the horse escape in the Casino planet was akin to the barrel escape scene in Hobbit)\, zero character development (I literally don't care if Finn\, Rose or Poe live or die)\, and zero respect paid to the mythos\, consistency and icons of the series. \n\nThis is the beginning of the end for the franchise\, I am sure of it.
